long_description: The smallest, lightest SteriPEN, the SteriPEN Adventurer Opti Water Purifier uses a revolutionary optical eye to sense and purify the water in even the coldest of conditions. New optical sensor doubles as a convenient LED flashlight. Flashlight mode is activated by pressing and holding the single button down for 3 seconds. Clear lamp cover focuses the LED light. Retail package includes 2 non-rechargeable (disposable) CR123 batteries and a neoprene case with belt loop. Device works with containers with minimum 1.75 in. diameter opening (i.e. Nalgene wide-mouth bottles). Battery life: disposable-100 treatments (16 oz../0.5 liter); rechargeable-40-50 treatments (16 oz../0.5 liter). UV lamp life: 8,000 treatments.
